wikipedia_page.main: Al Paul Hamilton Greene (born 5 May 1978) is a Gibraltarian former footballer who most notably played as a forward for Glacis United, as well as various spells in the lower leagues of Spain. Towards the end of his career, he also turned out for Lions Gibraltar and St Joseph's, as well as representing the Gibraltar national football team once after they joined UEFA.

response: *Al Denney, professional wrestler of the 1960s and 1970s who used the ringname Al Greene
*Al Greene (baseball) (1954–2014), baseball player for the Detroit Tigers
